Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the interior is covered with a glossy dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393884) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393884)
